TABLE.NAME: tool_encoded_potential_records
TABLE.COMMENT: Output of ad-hoc tasks where suspected fields are stored.

FIELD.NAME: native_id
FIELD.COMMENT: The original ID of the record in its table.

FIELD.NAME: pid
FIELD.COMMENT: Our task to get the meta info about the report.

FIELD.NAME: link_fragment
FIELD.COMMENT: A slug to build a URL to directly access the content.

FIELD.NAME: report_table
FIELD.COMMENT: Table this record was found in.

FIELD.NAME: report_columns
FIELD.COMMENT: The csv formatted name of columns searched within.

FIELD.NAME: mimetype
FIELD.COMMENT: The type that was found in the column.
